participant_1.background:
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
I took my camera with me to take photos of the beautiful scenery and interesting people I met.
i am a grandparent at 44.
i have perfect pitch.
I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

participant_2.background:
I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is.
I live a life of fun and adventures with my friends and love capturing the moments with my iPhone
I remember buying my first bicycle when I was 12 years old.
i make robots for a living.
I'd like to share my love of reading and cooking with you.

content.text: What was your favorite book you read last year?
I loved the book "The Martian". It was such a great story and I couldn't put it down.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love spending time with my friends and family. We go on adventures together and I love taking photos of the beautiful scenery.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to be a barista but I'm now a robot maker. I love my job but I miss the social aspect of being a barista.
I could imagine that! Do you get to make robots that do fun things?
Yes! I make robots that can help people with tasks around the house, like cleaning and cooking.
That's so cool! I'd love to see one of your robots in action.
Maybe I can bring one by sometime!
That would be awesome! I love seeing new things.
